snippet: Questions have been raised about whether the head of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences, Leslie C. Berlowitz, falsely claimed she had a doctorate on grant applications.
abstract: Questions have been raised about whether the head of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences, Leslie C. Berlowitz, falsely claimed she had a doctorate on grant applications.

headline.main: Humanities Endowment to Investigate Grants Made to Scholarly Society
